data.title: Pizza Hut not honoring my Pizza Order [Archive]
data.meta_description:
Fucking terrible. Fellow beyonder gave me a promo code, says it's a huge sale on Pizzas at Pizza Hut. I'm a Pizza 73 guy, and was about to order dinner, and so I decided to give Pizza Hut a try. Ordered it, sure enough it's real. Even have confirmation and receipt. 
 
5 mins later get a call from Pizza Hut refusing to fulfill my order, says it's an online glitch. I explained I have a receipt here, and they're refusing to honor it. They called back to the manager, call me back and confirmed my
